publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-441.1 Karen Whitefield: Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes—As an amendment to motion (S1M-441) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, leave out from "deplores" to end and insert "welcomes the Scottish Executive’s continuing commitment to fulfilling targets for reducing class sizes, recognises the significant improvements in this area, and notes that the additional money for Scottish Opera and the National Stadium project at Hampden did not in any way detract from this commitment."

S1M-441.1 Karen Whitefield: Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes—As an amendment to motion (S1M-441) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, leave out from "deplores" to end and insert "welcomes the Scottish Executive’s continuing commitment to fulfilling targets for reducing class sizes, recognises the significant improvements in this area, and notes that the additional money for Scottish Opera and the National Stadium project at Hampden did not in any way detract from this commitment."
S1M-441.1 Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes (lodged on 26 January 2000) Dr Elaine Murray*
S1M-441.1 Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes (lodged on 26 January 2000) Elaine Thomson*

S1M-441.1 Karen Whitefield: Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes—As an amendment to motion (S1M-441) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, leave out from "deplores" to end and insert "welcomes the Scottish Executive’s continuing commitment to fulfilling targets for reducing class sizes, recognises the significant improvements in this area, and notes that the additional money for Scottish Opera and the National Stadium project at Hampden did not in any way detract from this commitment." Supported by: Dr Elaine Murray, Elaine Thomson

S1M-441.1 Karen Whitefield: Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes-As an amendment to motion (S1M-441) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, leave out from "deplores" to end and insert "welcomes the Scottish Executive's continuing commitment to fulfilling targets for reducing class sizes, recognises the significant improvements in this area, and notes that the additional money for Scottish Opera and the National Stadium project at Hampden did not in any way detract from this commitment." Supported by: Dr Elaine Murray, Elaine Thomson

S1M-441.1 Karen Whitefield: Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes—As an amendment to motion (S1M-441) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, leave out from "deplores" to end and insert "welcomes the Scottish Executive’s continuing commitment to fulfilling targets for reducing class sizes, recognises the significant improvements in this area, and notes that the additional money for Scottish Opera and the National Stadium project at Hampden did not in any way detract from this commitment." Supported by: Dr Elaine Murray, Elaine Thomson
S1M-441.1 Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes (lodged on 26 January 2000) Dr Richard Simpson*

S1M-441.1 Karen Whitefield: Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes—As an amendment to motion (S1M-441) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, leave out from "deplores" to end and insert "welcomes the Scottish Executive’s continuing commitment to fulfilling targets for reducing class sizes, recognises the significant improvements in this area, and notes that the additional money for Scottish Opera and the National Stadium project at Hampden did not in any way detract from this commitment." Supported by: Dr Elaine Murray, Elaine Thomson, Dr Richard Simpson

S1M-441.1 Karen Whitefield: Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes—As an amendment to motion (S1M-441) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, leave out from "deplores" to end and insert "welcomes the Scottish Executive’s continuing commitment to fulfilling targets for reducing class sizes, recognises the significant improvements in this area, and notes that the additional money for Scottish Opera and the National Stadium project at Hampden did not in any way detract from this commitment." Supported by: Dr Elaine Murray, Elaine Thomson, Dr Richard Simpson
S1M-441.1 Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes (lodged on 26 January 2000) Mr Duncan McNeil*, Maureen Macmillan*

S1M-441.1 Karen Whitefield: Commitment to Reducing Class Sizes—As an amendment to motion (S1M-441) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, leave out from "deplores" to end and insert "welcomes the Scottish Executive’s continuing commitment to fulfilling targets for reducing class sizes, recognises the significant improvements in this area, and notes that the additional money for Scottish Opera and the National Stadium project at Hampden did not in any way detract from this commitment." Supported by: Dr Elaine Murray, Elaine Thomson, Dr Richard Simpson, Mr Duncan McNeil, Maureen Macmillan
